property.name: lastRoom
property.value: SELECT Max(Room) AS LastRoom FROM dbo.Worker;

property.name: workerListByRoom
property.value: SELECT Room , Name , ProfessionName , EnduranceName , Cost FROM dbo.`View Worker List By Room`;

property.name: workerListByCost
property.value:
SELECT WK.Room , WK.Name , PR.ProfessionName , EN.EnduranceName , WK.Cost FROM dbo.Worker WK
INNER JOIN dbo.Profession PR ON PR.Profession = WK.Profession
INNER JOIN Endurance EN ON EN.Endurance = WK.Endurance
WHERE WK.Cost != 0 AND PR.ProfessionName != 'Businessman'
ORDER BY WK.Cost;

property.name: insert
property.value: INSERT INTO dbo.Worker ( Room , Name , Profession , Endurance , Cost ) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?);

property.name: updateWorker
property.value: UPDATE dbo.Worker SET name = ? , profession = ? , endurance = ? , cost = ? WHERE (room = ?);
